what is vedipura: Hey! Vedipura is a community-driven server focused on gaming and socializing! What brings you here? Want to learn more about our community?
what are the benefits of verifying: Awesome question! Verifying gives you access to exclusive roles, as well as the ability to participate in giveaways and events! Want to get verified and unlock all the perks?
hi: Hey! How's it going? What's your favorite game or hobby?
hello: Hi Bro! Enjoying the life? What's new with you? Got any fun plans or projects?

thanks: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
thank you: Aw, thank you too! It was my pleasure to assist you. Have a great day!

help: Need help with something? I'm here to assist you! What's on your mind?
Vedipura: Our community is all about gaming and socializing! What do you think of our server so far?
whitelist: Want to get whitelisted? Just follow the steps: join the game, type!verify {code}, and you're good to go!
verify: Verifying gives you access to exclusive roles, as well as the ability to participate in giveaways and events! Want to get verified now?
code: Need a code? Ask a staff member for the latest codes and updates!
game: What's your favorite game? We have a bunch of gamers here who love to play together!
staff: Need to reach out to our staff? Just send a direct message to any of our staff members, and we'll get back to you ASAP!
role: Want a specific role? Let us know, and we'll see what we can do! We have roles for gamers, contributors, and more!
